fields.name: Absol

fields.name: Alolan Ninetales
fields.desc: Alolan Ninetales uses moves that freeze its opponents in ice, making them unable to move or attack.

fields.name: Blastoise
fields.desc: Blastoise is a durable ranged defender that can make use of its several mobility skills to move itself and enemies into the ideal areas of the battlefield.

fields.name: Blissey
fields.desc: Blissey is a PokÃ©mon that excels at supporting its allies with moves that restore HP, cure status conditions, or empower allies!

fields.name: Charizard

fields.name: Cramorant
fields.desc: Cramorant is the Gulp PokÃ©mon. Cramorantâ€™s Ability, Gulp Missile, allows it to attack by spitting out prey it catches with Dive.

fields.name: Crustle
fields.desc: Crustle hinders its opponents using many different moves.

fields.name: Eldegoss
fields.desc: Eldegoss is a master supporter that can restore its alliesâ€™ HP and boost their movement speed.

fields.name: Garchomp
fields.desc: Garchompâ€™s Ability, Rough Skin, means it can sometimes cause damage to PokÃ©mon that hit it, so opponents that attack Garchomp carelessly may just get struck back. Whatâ€™s more, using Dig lets Garchomp sneak-attack its opponents from underground.

fields.name: Gardevoir
fields.desc: Gardevoir strikes its opponents from far away with its mysterious psychic power. It has a lot of moves with unique movements, but they are very powerful when used effectively.

fields.name: Gengar
fields.desc: Gengar, a PokÃ©mon that lurks in the shadows, is a master of surprise attacks.

fields.name: Greninja
fields.desc: Greninja is a PokÃ©mon that uses smokescreens and illusory copies of itself to hide.

fields.name: Lucario
fields.desc: Lucario is a well-balanced PokÃ©mon that combines speed and attack power.

fields.name: Machamp
fields.desc: Machamp is a PokÃ©mon that specializes in melee combat, powered by its strong fighting moves.

fields.name: Mamoswine
fields.desc: Mamoswine is a high-durability Pokemon with an arsenal of crowd-control moves capable of directing teamfights to its favor.

fields.name: Mr. Mime
fields.desc: Mr. Mime specializes in hindering opposing PokÃ©mon with its tricky moves.

fields.name: Pikachu
fields.desc: Pikachu is a PokÃ©mon that excels at attacking opponents from far away with electricity. Sometimes the attacks even leave opposing PokÃ©mon paralyzed!

fields.name: Slowbro
fields.desc: No matter the situation, Slowbro goes about life at its own pace. With its characteristic high defense and blissful unawareness, Slowbro is unfazed by opponentsâ€™ attacks.

fields.name: Snorlax
fields.desc: Snorlax can take a lot of hits. Itâ€™s a dependable PokÃ©mon that can protect its allies from harm.

fields.name: Sylveon
fields.desc: Sylveon is effective against Sp.Atk. Pokemon, weakening their damage output while increasing both its Sp.Atk. and Sp.Def. stats.

fields.name: Talonflame
fields.desc: Talonflame toys with the opposing team by using its moves to quickly maneuver itself and fly over obstacles.

fields.name: Venusaur
fields.desc: If its moves land successfully, Venusaur can deal a huge amount of damage to its opponents, even from far away.

fields.name: Wigglytuff
fields.desc: Wigglytuff learns lots of moves that can stop opponents in their tracks, making it well-suited to using teamwork tactics with its allies in battle.

fields.name: Zeraora
fields.desc: Zeraora can close the distance between itself and its opponents as fast as lightning, dealing massive amounts of damage all at once.
